name: Panda Flash
description:
How To Play:
1,Press on the screen and remove to make a crossing.
2,While crossing you can attack!
3,Get through the level well in the number of moves as game showed to you.
4, Enjoy!
Game Background:
On a remote and mysterious eastern continent, there was a bamboo forest where a pandaman tribe lived. They fed on bamboo and lived a peaceful life.
But one day, their peace was broken. A group of zombies invaded and took away their sacred artifact, the Golden Bamboo which was consecrated by generations of pandamen. These zombies took this sacred artifact to Golden City where their leader lived.
The Golden Bamboo is very important for the survival of pandamen on the eastern continent because it keeps the bamboo reproduction rate high. Now that it was taken away and a large field of bamboos are withering. Pandamen are facing a huge threat for survivial.
At this critical moment, the tribe elder, Panda Grandpa decided to send the Panda Warrior, Flash to find the missing artifact. Flash took his weapon and left the bamboo forest in search of the Golden Bamboo. He marched over the Flame Mountain, crossed the Great Sea and Red Continent to arrive at Golden City. Face to face with the Zombie Leader – Abubu, he triumphed over his enemy and took back the Golden Bamboo to its home in the Bamboo Forest. With the Golden Bamboo, he solved the problem on his continent and saved the entire Pandaman tribe.
From then on, Pandamen lived a carefree life as they always had before.
The End
